message: I propose a 90/10 split, I'll take the bigger share since I have to deal with the inflation.  What do you say?
Let's split the money evenly, but I'll take a slightly larger share since I don't have to deal with your inflation.
I'll take a slightly bigger share than last round, but still offer you a pretty good deal.  Let's end this.
I'm feeling generous. Let's split it evenly this time. No more back and forth.
